tagger <- worker("tag")

    mutate(word = map(Tem,function(x)segment(x, tagger))) %>% 
    select(word, everything()) %>% 
    mutate(word = purrr::map(word, function(x)str_c(names(x), "_", x))) %>%

    separate(word, c("pos", "word"), sep = "_") %>% 
    filter(!(word %in% stopWords$word))
